snippet.title: The Red Bell's Lament for Nintendo Switch™ - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
The latest from AmuLit! Check out the teaser for The Red Bell's Lament, an upcoming download-exclusive game for the Nintendo Switch™

"Humans: fragile, fleeting, beautiful."

◆X（Twitter）
The Red Bell's Lament ：https://x.com/RedBellsLament
AmuLit：https://x.com/AmuLit_Global

◆Official Site◆
https://products.voltage.co.jp/redbell/english

◆Official Portal Site◆
https://products.voltage.co.jp/switch/english/

◆Participating Creators◆
Director: Nachi
Scenario: Yuzuki
Illustrator: Norita
Backgrounds: Minoru Akiba
BGM: Yamato
Theme: 9mm Parabellum Bullet

――――――――――――――

*AmuLit is Voltage Inc's new brand for console platforms.
*The Red Bell's Lament is the official title for Project Code Vampire Hunter, announced in 2023.
